name: Raceway FREE
description:
Animal go-carting at its finest! Drive your lion cart to victory in this single track version of Raceway!

Features:
- Fast racing action,
- Vibrant 3D track, animals and carts,
- Selectable difficulty levels,
- 2 player split-screen play on iPad.

Not enough? Search for "Raceway" to see all the extra features in the full-version.
